name: The Gravity Switch
description:
I'm just starting out developing in Unity and I thought it would be a fun project to try and recreate the mechanics of VVVVVV in my own game. 

DISCLAMER: I do not claim to have come up with these mechanics myself. I am just implementing them into my own project and levels as a fun project.

The mechanics are pretty much there now but the level needs some work. Currently the aim is to collect all the collectables. There are around 5 at the moment.

Aspect ratio in browser causes a known bug with the camera not showing the edges of the level.

Controls:

  • Move: A-D
  • Switch gravity: Spacebar
